不能忍了
找一个leetcode的替代品是当务之急
每次都这样等半天才有结果太让人难搜了
以前的用户体验这么好, 真不明白为什么要改版

#Pascal’s Triangle >Given numRows, generate the first numRows of Pascal’s triangle.

#Pascal’s Triangle II >Given an index k, return the kth row of the Pascal’s triangle.

For example, given k = 3,
Return [1,3,3,1].
Could you optimize your algorithm to use only O(k) extra space?
